attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Halt the cruel treatment of chickens in overloaded unhygenic sheds and ban the large supermarkets from profiting and supporting this cruel trade.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

and a similar petition already exists:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/savethechickens/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
